name: Item Check for Final Fantasy 7
description:
iTemchecker for Final Fantasy 7 is a guide which shows you how to find all treasures in Final Fantasy 7. It provides a complete list of all items, equipments, enemy skills and materias, as well as important actions you have to do in order to unlock treasures later in the game. All treasures are listed in game order, include screenshots and optionally an explanation in case the treasure is hard to find.

Can you get all items in FF7 ? :)


Please note:
Screenshots are loaded from the internet, so make sure you have a working wifi or mobile connection.

Thanks to:
http://lorcblog.blogspot.hk/ for the icons
